title: cryptocurrency
description: The User Agent object schema for extension-definition--6cea4dc9-9517-44b8-b021-ae82e2f1de43

type.description: The value of this property MUST be `user-agent`.

string.description: Specifies the full user agent string
string.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 11; Lenovo YT-J706X) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/96.0.4664.45 Safari/537.36

software.description: Name and version of the browser software used.

system.description: Details of the system in which the browser is running.

browser_enhancements.description: This is used by the browser to indicate specific enhancements that are available directly in the browser or through third parties.
